/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a stark contrast between the natural and man-made elements. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
